      • worldToCanvas

        public static Point worldToCanvas(Client client,
                                  int x,
                                  int y,
                                  int plane)
        Translates two-dimensional ground coordinates within the 3D world to their corresponding coordinates on the game screen.
        Parameters:
        client -
        x - ground coordinate on the x axis
        y - ground coordinate on the y axis
        plane - ground plane on the z axis
        Returns:
        a Point on screen corresponding to the position in 3D-space

      • worldToCanvas

        public static Point worldToCanvas(Client client,
                                  int x,
                                  int y,
                                  int plane,
                                  int zOffset)
        Translates two-dimensional ground coordinates within the 3D world to their corresponding coordinates on the game screen.
        Parameters:
        client -
        x - ground coordinate on the x axis
        y - ground coordinate on the y axis
        plane - ground plane on the z axis
        zOffset - distance from ground on the z axis
        Returns:
        a Point on screen corresponding to the position in 3D-space

      • worldToCanvas

        public static Point worldToCanvas(Client client,
                                  int x,
                                  int y,
                                  int plane,
                                  int tileX,
                                  int tileY)
        Translates two-dimensional ground coordinates within the 3D world to their corresponding coordinates on the game screen. Calculating heights based on the coordinates of the tile provided, rather than the world coordinates Using the position of each vertex, rather than the location of the object, to determine the height of each vertex causes the mesh to be vertically warped, based on the terrain below
        Parameters:
        client -
        x - ground coordinate on the x axis
        y - ground coordinate on the y axis
        plane - ground plane on the z axis
        tileX - the X coordinate of the tile the object is on
        tileY - the Y coordinate of the tile the object is on
        Returns:
        a Point on screen corresponding to the position in 3D-space

      • worldToCanvas

        public static Point worldToCanvas(Client client,
                                  int x,
                                  int y,
                                  int plane,
                                  int tileX,
                                  int tileY,
                                  int zOffset)
        Translates two-dimensional ground coordinates within the 3D world to their corresponding coordinates on the game screen. Calculating heights based on the coordinates of the tile provided, rather than the world coordinates Using the position of each vertex, rather than the location of the object, to determine the height of each vertex causes the mesh to be vertically warped, based on the terrain below
        Parameters:
        client -
        x - ground coordinate on the x axis
        y - ground coordinate on the y axis
        plane - ground plane on the z axis
        tileX - the X coordinate of the tile the object is on
        tileY - the Y coordinate of the tile the object is on
        zOffset - distance from ground on the z axis
        Returns:
        a Point on screen corresponding to the position in 3D-space

      • worldToMiniMap

        public static Point worldToMiniMap(Client client,
                                   int x,
                                   int y)
        Translates two-dimensional ground coordinates within the 3D world to their corresponding coordinates on the Minimap.
        Parameters:
        client -
        x - ground coordinate on the x axis
        y - ground coordinate on the y axis
        Returns:
        a Point on screen corresponding to the position in 3D-space

      • worldToMiniMap

        public static Point worldToMiniMap(Client client,
                                   int x,
                                   int y,
                                   int distance)
        Translates two-dimensional ground coordinates within the 3D world to their corresponding coordinates on the Minimap.
        Parameters:
        client -
        x - ground coordinate on the x axis
        y - ground coordinate on the y axis
        distance - max distance from local player to minimap point
        Returns:
        a Point on screen corresponding to the position in 3D-space

      • getTileHeight

        public static int getTileHeight(Client client,
                                int localX,
                                int localY,
                                int plane)
        Calculates the above ground height of a tile point.
        Parameters:
        client -
        localX - the ground coordinate on the x axis
        localY - the ground coordinate on the y axis
        plane - the client plane/ground level
        Returns:
        the offset from the ground of the tile

      • getCanvasTilePoly

        public static Polygon getCanvasTilePoly(Client client,
                                        LocalPoint localLocation)
        Calculates a tile polygon from offset worldToScreen() points.
        Parameters:
        client -
        localLocation - local location of the tile
        Returns:
        a Polygon on screen corresponding to the given localLocation.

      • getCanvasTileAreaPoly

        public static Polygon getCanvasTileAreaPoly(Client client,
                                            LocalPoint localLocation,
                                            int size)
        Returns a polygon representing an area.
        Parameters:
        client -
        localLocation - Center location of the AoE
        size - size of the area. Ex. Lizardman Shaman AoE is a 3x3, so size = 3
        Returns:
        a polygon representing the tiles in the area

                                          LocalPoint localLocation,
                                          String text,
                                          int zOffset)
        Calculates text position and centers depending on string length.
        Parameters:
        client -
        graphics -
        localLocation - local location of the tile
        text - string for width measurement
        zOffset - offset from ground plane
        Returns:
        a Point on screen corresponding to the given localLocation.

      • getClickbox

        public static Area getClickbox(Client client,
                               Model model,
                               int orientation,
                               int tileX,
                               int tileY)
        You don't want this. Use TileObject.getClickbox() instead Get the on-screen clickable area of model as though it's for the object on the tile at (tileX, tileY) and rotated to angle orientation
        Parameters:
        client -
        model - the model to calculate a clickbox for
        orientation - the orientation of the model (0-2048, where 0 is north)
        tileX - the X coordinate of the tile that the object using the model is on
        tileY - the Y coordinate of the tile that the object using the model is on
        Returns:
        the clickable area of model, rotated to angle orientation, at the height of tile (tileX, tileY)

      • getCanvasTextMiniMapLocation

                                                 Graphics2D graphics,
                                                 LocalPoint localLocation,
                                                 String text)

        text - string for width measurement
        Returns:
        a Point on screen corresponding to the given localLocation.
